HowItWorks.title: How Souper Scanner Works Its Magic
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Capture a photo of your handwritten or printed recipe. Our intelligent system is ready to receive it.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Our advanced AI (Google Vision & Gemini) processes your image, extracting ingredients, steps, and notes, then formats it beautifully.
HowItWorks.step3Desc: Review, rearrange, and edit the AI-generated recipe in markdown. Save it to your personalized digital cookbook.

Benefits.title: Why You'll Love Souper Scanner
Benefits.benefit1Desc: Digitize all your family recipes, magazine clippings, and handwritten notes. Securely stored in the cloud.
Benefits.benefit2Desc: Easily share your perfected recipes with friends and family, without the hassle of retyping.
Benefits.benefit3Desc: Our intuitive markdown editor makes tweaking AI-generated content a breeze. Focus on cooking, not formatting.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy

collection.title: 1. Information Collection
collection.content1: We collect information you provide directly to us when you create an account, such as your name, email address, and any optional profile information (phone, address).
collection.content2: When you use our scanning service, we collect the images you upload for the purpose of recipe extraction.

processing.title: 2. AI Processing & Third Parties
processing.content1: Souper Scanner utilizes Google Gemini services (LLM) and Google Cloud Vision (OCR) to process your images and generate recipe content.
processing.content2: By using the service, you acknowledge that your uploaded images and the resulting extracted text will be processed by Google's infrastructure. We do not use your data to train our own models, but third-party AI providers may have their own data handling policies.

retention.title: 3. Data Retention
retention.storageContent: We only store your uploaded images temporarily. Once the AI agent has successfully processed the image and generated the digital recipe content, the original image is cleared from our active processing storage.
retention.content: Extracted recipe text and your account profile information are stored securely in our database for as long as your account remains active.

security.title: 4. Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including password hashing (bcrypt) and encrypted connections. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies primarily for session management and authentication via NextAuth.js. These are necessary for the application to function and recognize you across different pages.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: You may view, edit, or delete your account information at any time through your profile settings. Upon account deletion, all personal data associated with your account will be permanently removed from our databases.

Privacy.contact: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at privacy@souperscanner.com

Terms.title: Terms of Service

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Souper Scanner, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all of these terms, do not use our service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: Souper Scanner provides AI-powered recipe scanning and management tools. We use advanced OCR and Large Language Models (LLMs) like Google Gemini to extract data from images provided by users.

usage.title: 3. Fair Usage & Limits
usage.content: To ensure high quality of service for all users, we implement the following monthly scan limits:
usage.prohibited: Automated scanning, bot usage, or any attempt to circumvent these limits is strictly prohibited and may result in account termination.

content.title: 4. User Content & Copyright
content.content: You retain ownership of any images or text you upload. However, you are responsible for ensuring you have the right to digitize and store the recipes you upload. Souper Scanner respects intellectual property rights and expects users to do the same.

disclaimers.title: 5. Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: Souper Scanner is an AI-powered tool. While we strive for accuracy, AI extraction can occasionally result in errors in measurements, ingredients, or instructions. Always verify AI-generated content against your original source. We are not liable for any kitchen accidents, failed dishes, or dietary issues resulting from the use of our service.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the service at our sole discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users of the service, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.

Terms.contact: If you have any questions regarding these terms, please contact us at legal@souperscanner.com
